title: Senior developer codes ENTIRE electron app in 30 days (not for beginners)
description:
‚è≥¬†Manage your time, your way ‚Üí https://timeva.app

This is my first youtube video! Woo! Let me know if you have any ideas, thoughts or questions in the comments.

From May 1st to June 1st 2022 I set out to build an ENTIRE app within 30 days. Can I do it? Let's see.

üìï My story

Hey coders. I'm Dan Isler, an indie developer from Murderapolis, Minnesota.

I've been coding for 10+ years now and after grinding out code for tech companies I decided I wanted to prove to myself that I could build valuable software on my own terms. I quickly learned coding is only a third of the story. I'm learning to put together the remaining pieces in order to become a true indie developer. 

On this channel I share my journey with you to connect, share, entertain and to teach but ultimately, to help you accelerate your own journey. 


Follow along the journey. Together we will create, build, make mistakes, learn and iterate.

In success or failure - I'll see you in the next one!

üíª¬†Software

- Vue3 (setup) https://vuejs.org/
- Typescript https://www.typescriptlang.org/
- Electronjs https://www.electronjs.org/
- Pinia https://pinia.vuejs.org/
- Vite https://vitejs.dev/
- SASS https://sass-lang.com/
- Github copilot https://copilot.github.com/
- Electron + vite + vue template: https://github.com/cawa-93/vite-electron-builder
